title: Charged twice for a champion
body: Today i Bought Jayce and as he costs 880 RP i bought him with my 2,987 RP easily. The after I bought him I only had 1,227. I knew that wasn't right so I backed out and logged back in still having 1,227 RP. I then went to my purchase history and there were two Jayces both 880 RP each so that's 1,760 RP lost from a 880 RP purchase. Please help.

replies.body: YIKES! That's not supposed to happen. I've got the billing poros headed out with calculators to double check those numbers, so the next time you login you should see the right total for how much RP you *should* have.
